column1: Movements of Aircraft, Passenger and Freight
Notes : *  Hong Kong International Airport at Chek Lap Kok commenced operation on 6 July 1998.
@ arrival and departure passengers include transfer but exclude transit
β the amount of freight excludes air mail
¶  incomplete yearly total; percentage changes derived from same period over last year
Figures may not add up to the respective totals due to rounding.
Year-on-year percentage changes are derived from unrounded figures.
